ComicInfo.Title: FrankenMoose Meets the Wolf Jug Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Who-or what-is behind the creation of FrankenMoose? Whatever it is, it may pose the greatest threat to Jughead Jones yet-- and considering this is a guy who's fought bloodthirsty werewolves and armed to the teeth werewolf hunters, that's saying something!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Adam Gorham | 1 | B | Cover B | Matthew Dow Smith | 2 | C | Cover C | Tracy Yardley | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:35:39. [CVDB692496]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adam Gorham, Matthew Dow Smith, Tracy Yardley
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Jughead Jones, Moose Mason
